name: Tiny Gods
description:
Story

In Tiny Gods you play as Zeus on his quest for his lost power, you will be traversing through various locations within 285 CE Europe such as the Roman colosseum or the forests of Germania all while fighting an onslaught of enemies. As you are a God you will also be able to recruit enemies to your campaign helping you in your efforts to regain your lost power.

Mechanics / Controls

Movement: Use A and D to go left and right. Spacebar to Jump

Attacking: Use the left mouse button to do a melee attack.

Recruitment: Use Q when near an enemy to turn them into a friendly, they will not attack you and  you wont be able to attack them.

Pause Screen: You can use P to pause your game at any time.
